text: Aur jiss jagah say aap niklen apna mun masjid-e-haram ki taraf pher len aur jahan kahin tum ho apney chehray issi taraf kiya kero takay logon ki koi hujjat tum per baqi na reh jaye siwaye unn logon kay jinhon ney inn mein say zulm kiya hai tum inn say na daro mujh hi say daro aur takay mein apni nemat tum per poori keroon aur iss liye bhi kay tum raah-e-raast pao
